analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sani dassana ttika atīta ārammaṇa ttika

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naatītārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho atītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na atīta ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca anidassana appaṭighaḥ atīta ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naanāgatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho anāgatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na anāgata ārammaṇam dhammam paccayā anidassana appaṭighaḥ anāgata ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ napaccuppannārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa ppaṭigham na paccuppanna ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca anidassana appaṭighaḥ paccuppanna ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
